department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: cream-colored, woven with subtle white designs on bottom of birds on flowers, diamond grid, zigzags and blocks; top woven in purple, magenta and yellow with flowers, zigzags, birds and geometric designs; embroidered rounded neckline in yellow, mint green, dark blue, purple and magenta
markings: at one side on hem, on tag: [TEX-2953]
title: Ceremonial woman's  blouse (Huipil)
